= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *ear-sensory-data*
   * *ear-inner-hair-cells*: frequency-aligned tonotopic mapping
   * *Ear - outer hair cells feedback* (ear-outer-hair-cells-feedback -> [BrainRegionABA_PN_SG_SP ABA.PN.SG.SP]): verifies amplify actions done
   * *Ear - somatic receptors* (ear-somatic -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_GNG AVA.PN.SG.GNG]): from skin to geniculate ganglion to spinal trigeminal nucleus
   * *Ear - outer ear skin* (ear-external-skin -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): skin over the mastoid process, back of the auricle, lobule and a portion of the scalp
   * *Ear - acoustic meatus skin* (ear-acoustic-meatus-skin -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): from skin lining external acoustic meatus, and tympanic membrane to trigeminal gangion
   * *Ear - visceral receptors* (ear-visceral -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_JUG AVA.PN.SG.JUG]): pain, temperature, and touch
   * *Ear - timpanic cavity* (ear-timpanic-cavity -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_PET AVA.PN.SG.PET]): pain, temperature, and touch
  * *Ear sensory control* (ear-sensory-control)
   * *ear-cristae-maculae*: activate afferent receptors in response to rotational and linear acceleration
   * *Ear - outer hair cells* ([BrainRegionABA_MM_SOC ABA.MM.SOC] -> ear-outer-hair-cells): contracts basilar membrane; mechanically amplify low-level sound that enters cochlea
   * *Ear - stapedius muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> ear-stapedius): dampens vibrations of stapes
   * *Ear - tympanic membrane muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> ear-tensor-tympani-muscle): dampen sounds, such as those produced from chewing
  * *Ear move* (ear-move)
   * *ear-anterior-auricular-muscle*: pulls ear forward
   * *Ear - posterior auricular muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> ear-posterior-auricular-muscle): pulls ear backward
   * *Ear - superior auricular muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> ear-superior-auricular-muscle): pulls ear upward
   * *Ear - oblique muscle of auricle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> ear-oblique-auricular-muscle): movement of the ears
   * *Ear - temporoparietalis muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> ear-temporoparietalis-muscle): assist the frontal belly in drawing the epicranial aponeurosis towards the front of the cranium
